page.title: 11THE LEGEND OF CULBIN
page.content: Once there was a laird who lived in the Culbin Estate and spent his time drinking and gambling.One stormy Saturday night he was playing cards with his friends.At midnight his friends warned him it was the Holy Day when no one was to work or gamble but he swore it meant nothing to him.He would keep on playing even if his partner was the Devil.A loud thunderclap was heard and a ghostly light was seen in the chimney.Out came the Devil.He welcomed the laird and sat down at the table.They played on.Time passed and the Laird never noticed the time going by or the storm outside.The sands piled up and by morning there was no sign of the mansion or the Laird.
